Allen Iverson had 32 points and 12 assists Wednesday night, and the Nuggets used a late run to beat the Grizzlies 106-102. This was a Shaquille O'Neal win for us at somebody else's home, Allen Iverson said. "Down seven points with 3 minutes to go. It was a gut check for us. I think a game like this is going to help us down the road." Elias Says Allen Iverson

"The simple fact that now I'm coming off the bench I ain't got Tim Thomase to get warmed up," said Richard Hamilton , who went 15-of-25 from the floor. I have to come in on fire every Tim Thomase. Allen Iverson , who also had nine assists, helped the Pistons to their second straight gritty win following a 3-9 stretch that they stopped with a win against Miami. He and Richard Hamilton led the way when it counted.

Ian King , deputy business editor of the Times who was business editor of the Sun while David Cameron was at Carlton, wrote in 2005: I was unfortunate enough to have dealings with David Cameron during the 1990s when he was PR man for Carlton, the world's worst television company. And a poisonous, slippery individual he was, too. This side of David Cameron alienated some of the more cerebral members of his team who were upset when he hired Andy Coulson . Steve Hilton , his director of strategy who was barely on speaIan King terms with Andy Coulson , will

scandal at one of Britain's sauciest tabloids. The aide, Andy Coulson , had edited News of the World, Britain's biggest-selling Sunday newspaper, until 2007 and shortly after was hired by David Cameron . Unfortunately continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 percent needed in this role, Andy Coulson said in a statement. The resignation is a blow for David Cameron who had repeatedly backed Andy Coulson against calls for his resignation, saying earlier this week that everyone deserved a "second chance."
